title: Case Lifecycle Management
description: Deep dive into individual case progression through legal stages with stage-specific actions

buttons.name: Advance Stage
buttons.purpose: Move case to the next legal stage with validation
buttons.gstExample: Advance from 'Demand' to 'Adjudication' after filing reply

buttons.name: Add Milestone
buttons.purpose: Record significant case events and achievements

buttons.name: Generate Tasks
buttons.gstExample: Auto-generate appeal filing tasks when case reaches Appeals stage

buttons.name: View Prerequisites
buttons.gstExample: Ensure all documents are ready before advancing to hearing stage

buttons.name: Stage Timeline
buttons.gstExample: See complete GST litigation journey from notice to resolution

philosophy: Every case follows a structured lifecycle that ensures consistency, compliance, and optimal outcomes through systematic progression

examples.solution: Start case at 'Scrutiny' stage and follow systematic review process
examples.benefit: Systematic approach ensures no critical details are missed

examples.solution: Use stage advancement to move from 'Adjudication' to 'Appeals'
examples.benefit: Automated task generation ensures all appeal requirements are met

examples.solution: Track progress through lifecycle timeline visualization
examples.benefit: Clear understanding of case status and next steps
